Where is the Barcode Maker Program?

Many thanks for installing TBarCode!

TBarCode11 is an advanced barcode generator software component supporting more than 100 different barcode symbologies. TBarCode can be used by software developers as well as by users. It contains the following modules:

  • Barcode DLL (Dynamic Link Library)
  • Barcode ActiveX Component
  • Barcode .NET Component

Please note: TBarCode is a software component. It can't be executed by itself. If you are looking for stand-alone barcode software or specific add-ins please read on!


More Barcode-Software Tools

Looking for stand-alone software or other barcode-tools for Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, SAP, Linux, UNIX, ...? Check out additional barcode- and barcode-label software from TEC-IT:

  • Barcode Add-In optimized for Word/Excel 2007/2010/2013: Download TBarCode Office or watch the YouTube videos.
  • Barcode Maker, Barcode Creator: Download Barcode Studio or watch the YouTube videos.
  • Label Printing and Report Generator Software: Download TFORMer Designer or watch the YouTube videos.
  • Barcode Printing Solutions for SAP ERP systems: Overview.
  • System-Level Barcode Extension for Linux, Mac OS X and UNIX: Overview.
